turbulence/grid_2d_type.documentation: Selection of one of a set of grid types for grid_2d. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence.

options.name: rectangular
options.description: Cylindrical R,Z ala eqdsk (R=dim1, Z=dim2). In this case the position arrays should not be filled since they are redundant with grid/dim1 and dim2.

options.name: inverse
options.description: Rhopolar_polar 2D polar coordinates (rho=dim1, theta=dim2) with magnetic axis as centre of grid; the polar angle is theta= -atan2(z-zaxis,r-raxis).

options.name: inverse_psi_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=1) (dim2); could be non-equidistant; magnetic axis as centre of grid

options.name: inverse_psi_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=2) (dim2)

options.name: inverse_psi_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=3) (dim2); could be non-equidistant

options.name: inverse_psi_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=4) (dim2), could be non-equidistant; magnetic axis as centre of grid

options.name: inverse_psi_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=5) (dim2)

options.name: inverse_psi_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=6) (dim2); could be non-equidistant

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: irregular_rz_na
options.description: Irregular grid, thus give list of vertices in dim1(1:ndim1), dim2(1:ndim1) and then all fields are on values(1:ndim1,1)

turbulence/grid_2d_type/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within grid_2d_type container: Selection of one of a set of grid types for grid_2d.

turbulence/grid_2d_type/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within grid_2d_type container: Selection of one of a set of grid types for grid_2d.

turbulence/grid_2d_type/description.documentation: Verbose description. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within grid_2d_type container: Selection of one of a set of grid types for grid_2d.

turbulence/grid_2d.documentation: Values for the 2D grid, for various time slices. The timebase of this array of structure must be a subset of the profiles_2d timebase. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence.

turbulence/grid_2d/dim1.documentation: First dimension values. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within grid_2d container: Values for the 2D grid, for various time slices. The timebase of this array of structure must be a subset of the profiles_2d timebase.

turbulence/grid_2d/dim2.documentation: Second dimension values. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within grid_2d container: Values for the 2D grid, for various time slices. The timebase of this array of structure must be a subset of the profiles_2d timebase.

turbulence/grid_2d/time.documentation: Time. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within grid_2d container: Values for the 2D grid, for various time slices. The timebase of this array of structure must be a subset of the profiles_2d timebase.

turbulence/profiles_2d.documentation: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence.

turbulence/profiles_2d/electrons.documentation: Quantities related to electrons. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices.

turbulence/profiles_2d/electrons/tempera.documentation: Temperature. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within electrons container: Quantities related to electrons.

turbulence/profiles_2d/electrons/density.documentation: Density (thermal+non-thermal). Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within electrons container: Quantities related to electrons.

Density of thermal particles. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within electrons container: Quantities related to electrons.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion.documentation: Quantities related to the various ion species. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/element.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/element/a.documentation: Mass of atom. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species. Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/element/z_n.documentation: Nuclear charge. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species. Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/element/atoms.documentation: Number of atoms of this element in the molecule. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species. Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/z_ion.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionization state; lumped ions are allowed), volume averaged over plasma radius. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/name.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...). Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/neutral_index.documentation: Index of the corresponding neutral species in the ../../neutral array. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/temperature.documentation: Temperature (average over charge states when multiple charge states are considered). Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/density.documentation: Density (thermal+non-thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered). Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/ion/density_therm.documentation: Density (thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered). Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within ion container: Quantities related to the various ion species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral.documentation: Quantities related to the various neutral species. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/element.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within neutral container: Quantities related to the various neutral species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/element/a.documentation: Mass of atom. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within neutral container: Quantities related to the various neutral species. Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/element/z.documentation: Nuclear charge. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within neutral container: Quantities related to the various neutral species. Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/element/a.documentation: Number of atoms of this element in the molecule. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within neutral container: Quantities related to the various neutral species. Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/name.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...). Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within neutral container: Quantities related to the various neutral species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/ion_index.documentation: Index of the corresponding ion species in the ../../ion array. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within neutral container: Quantities related to the various neutral species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/temperatu.documentation: Temperature (average over charge states when multiple charge states are considered). Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within neutral container: Quantities related to the various neutral species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/density.documentation: Density (thermal+non-thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered). Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within neutral container: Quantities related to the various neutral species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/neutral/density_t.documentation: Density (thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered). Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices. Within neutral container: Quantities related to the various neutral species.

turbulence/profiles_2d/time.documentation: Time. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence. Within profiles_2d container: Fluctuating physical quantities for various time slices.

turbulence/time.documentation: Generic time. Within turbulence IDS: Description of plasma turbulence.
